jobs.title: Junior Frontend Developer

jobs.description: Entry level accounting trainee role with structured training. Learn accounting principles and practices in a real business environment.

jobs.description: Sell SaaS products to businesses across Kenya, Uganda and Tanzania. Fully remote with commission-based compensation.

jobs.title: Data Entry Clerk
jobs.description: Accurate data entry for logistics operations. Fast-paced environment, opportunity to learn supply chain.

jobs.title: Agricultural Extension Officer
jobs.description: Support smallholder farmers with training on modern farming techniques and market access.
